title: 370. Q&AF: Getting Back Into A Routine, Police Against Wokeness & Creating Leaders Out Of Your Employees
itunes:title: 370. Q&AF: Getting Back Into A Routine, Police Against Wokeness & Creating Leaders Out Of Your Employees
description: In today's episode, Andy talks about what steps you should take to get back in your routine when dealing with distractions, the best way for police officers to handle wokeness with new leadership, and how to create effective leaders out of your employees.
